Narrative: Red 2021 Hyundai Santa Fe (MD plate: 8ER2848) stolen.
Young child left unattended in parked, off, and locked vehicle in 30 degree weather. Mother issued a criminal citation for neglect of a minor.
Officers found a stolen gray Huffy bicycle.
Security saw two people enter a vacant unit, officers responded and located two teenage boys, a 15-year-old and a 17-year-old. Both were takeninto custody and then released to their parents.
22-year-old woman arrested for fourth-degree burglary after entering victim's residence without permission. The victim did not know the woman.
Personal property stolen from storage locker.
Black Mercedes GLA (Texas plate: PMY1522) stolen after being left unlocked with a key in the center console.
Car vandalized with scratches running from the front driver door towards the hood of the vehicle and a scratch mark on the passenger sidedoor/panel.
Victim received threats over social media.
Rear passenger side window broken, nothing taken.
Rear back window broken, power tools stolen.
21-year-old Miracle Stokes reported missing. No critical factors.
Driver side window broken, personal property stolen.
Front passenger window broken, power tools stolen.
Driver side window broken, plumbing tools stolen.
2008 orange Chevy HHR (Florida plate: PJWJ86) stolen.
Front passenger side door handle stolen from 2014 Kia Sorrento.
Two cars had windows broken, personal property stolen.
Steering wheel airbags stolen from 2019 black Honda Odyssey and 2007 Honda CRV.
Steering wheel airbag stolen from 2021 Honda Pilot.

On December 30, 2022 at approximately 9:55 pm, Greenbelt Police officers located a stolen vehicle that was wanted in connection to an armedcarjacking in Washington, DC. Officers conducted a felony traffic stop and arrested the three adult male occupants. Officers recovered threehandguns, 125 grams of marijuana, and a digital scale. 22-year-old Titus Daytwon Kitrell, 20-year-old Rashad Kavon Johnson, and 19-year-oldNihleeq Rector were arrested.

16-year-old Morgan Patricia Allen (black, female, 5’5”, 125 lbs) was last seen on December 31, 2022 at approximately 12:30 am wearing a white t-shirt, black shorts, and a black scarf around her head in the 11 block of Parkway. The critical factor is age. If anyone comes into contact with her,please contact GPD at 301-474-7200.
Driver side rear window broken, personal property stolen.
2012 Kia Optima window broken and ignition damaged.
2020 gray Kia Sportage with (Ohio plate: JCK-2191) stolen.
Back windshield broken, personal property stolen.
Passenger side window broken, car rummaged through, nothing taken.
